name: CrystalCloud
description:
Crystal Cloud is a community experience in which players pick up crystals to terraform the world. 

    This game was created in 13 days with Sphalio and ロリー  during a GameJam, it's a student project. The objectif of this project was to make links between people all around the world by sharing pictures and telling funny stories that happened inside the world of CrystalCloud. 

    Feedbacks are very important for us, we are new to the world of Game Develepoment and could use your feedbacks to improve in the future. Thanks for trying CrystalClouds ! 

    Join our Discord to share your experience https://discord.gg/Hj3fsabudp

WARNING : You can't save your pictures if you are not connected to Discord ^^
